title: Headhunter akali.
body:
I'm a big akali fan, not so much a headhunter fan. But let me say, headhunter akali looks amazing. The theme fits her so damn well (Cough, caitlyn) and the particles were executed perfectly. The splash art is on point with the model and it's just a great color and look for her.

Now my only concern/problem to point out. The stocking/net is only on one leg... and it looks really strange to me, I'm not sure if it was intentional or not, so I thought I'd point it out.

/Thumbs up rito

replies.body:
Hiya Jixx! 

Thanks for the feedback in regards to Headhunter Akali! I'm so happy to hear you like the skin! 

The fishnet on one leg was a design choice, and was intentional. :]

If I may say something about HeadHunter Akali,more specifically the headhunter skin line.If we compare the older HH skins to the newer ones,there some clear inconsistencies.They all share the theme of course,having alien looking tech & the dreadlocks,that's it.

Is this a result of "redefining" what makes a headhunter skin?

Skin lines are always evolving. :] 

For example, the original Blood Moon skins share a similar vein with the more recent Blood Moon skins, but there's definitely some differences.

Is there any chance older skins will eventually be revamped to match the current quality? Personally I'd love an update to Blood Moon {{champion:98}}, Headhunter {{champion:11}} and {{champion:107}}, and Dragonslayer {{champion:59}} and {{champion:67}}. Especially the Dragonslayer skins, the older two are thematically different from the newer two, and the quality of {{champion:80}} and {{champion:201}} is much higher
Currently, the texture re-balances are the only thing we have planned/have been doing for older skins (unless it's a total VU like Sion.)
How many of the older skins/champions are left? You've done a lot of them, and I assume that the 6300-4800 ip champions are still fresh.
I'm not sure, to be completely honest. Champion Update is handling the texture re-balances.

however (excluding elise) the blood moon skin line overall feels more consistent.

But the male headhunter skins just feel so departed from the female versions. Rengar and Yi both lack the really cool beam weapons that the other skins have.

EDIT: in fact, when headhunter yi was first released, I assumed it was some jungle/south american scifi theme. Then rengar has this savana beast lord deal, now akali and caitlyn both have the epic alien gear.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ZbyAWz5w,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-02-27T20:20:36.090+0000)
>
> Skin lines are always evolving. :] 
> 
> For example, the original Blood Moon skins share a similar vein with the more recent Blood Moon skins, but there's definitely some differences.

Yeah, I have noticed that in some other skin lines too (i.e. Debonair)

I am always looking forward to see which skin lines rito will expand upon next :)
Any chance something could be done about her very round-looking kama "blades"? They look like thick fangs, and don't match the splash art at all.

Keep in mind that the splash art is an artistic representation of the in-game model, and although it's similar, it won't be exact. We can do a lot more in the splash art than we can in model.

At this time, we don't have plans to change the kamas.

For me personally, this discrepancy is a deal-breaker. Deadly Headhunter, pokes you to death with blunt fangs... It just doesn't quite make sense. Not only can she not possibly slash you with them, but the tips of the fangs don't even look sharp. It looks as though she has to kill you with blunt force.

I'm not sure where you're seeing that they're not sharp. Maybe it's from particular angles? 

EDIT: This preview isn't great. D: 

http://imgur.com/0XwUXS9

Perhaps it's just the way the texture looks, or lighting or something. But the blades on this skin don't look nearly as sharp as those on her base skin. These ones look much thicker and distinctly more round.

If you take a look at other Headhunter Skins, such as Caitlyn and Nidalee, you'll notice that the weapons are a bit thicker than their base weapons, for example. 

I think this discrepancy is due Akali not having a whole lot of variation of kamas in previous skins. This may be something that stands out because it's not what she usually has.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ZbyAWz5w,comment-id=0002000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-03T01:52:58.737+0000)
>
> If you take a look at other Headhunter Skins, such as Caitlyn and Nidalee, you'll notice that the weapons are a bit thicker than their base weapons, for example. 
> 
> I think this discrepancy is due Akali not having a whole lot of variation of kamas in previous skins. This may be something that stands out because it's not what she usually has.

Maybe just make the Kama she throws be 100% made of hard light like the blades on her Kamas are? (wouldn't be too hard just mainly a recolour and adding some fluorescence to the tossed kama). That way its not so much her throwing a kama as like a laser replica of one

Ugh, this' as bad if not worse than Marauder Ashe not receiving recolored particles to match the motif.

Please change/make plans for both.
I'm sorry you feel this way. D: We don't have plans to change either of them at this time.
Why? Just curious.

Are you familiar with the Predator series of Comics or Movies? (the movies starred Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny Glover, Respectively)

The alien creatures in these media are armored badass hunters and it is their attire that these skins are based on.

The fish-netting you see is a thermal control layer (according to the comics) and it is entirely for visual appeal that they are depicted as having this thermal layer distributed unevenly over their body.

Here's an image. This predator has the netting on his torso and legs, evenly distributed, but only on one of its arms. The positioning of the netting varied from creature to creature and so it is with the League Champions mimicking them.

http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2013/142/d/2/neca_1_4_scale_predator_2_repaint_by_mangrasshopper-d668xie.jpg
Headhunter Cait looks amazing, what are you talking about?
I like the skin... but it look a little bit like the silverfang skin
It's way better than the silver fang... I hate that skin :/
I imagine it was intentional. To make it edgy and asymmetrical, I imagine

so.. my question is... why isnt it released already.. 5.4 released Sona relatively fast after the initial patch.. i mean i remember seeing the post that says the in game sounds are not yet present.. but that almost seemed like "we will release the new looks but the new sounds you just gotta wait a little"
headhunter akali looks as a worse version of silverfang akali

Imo, this skin kinda leaves a sour taste in my mouth for the Headhunter line.
I liked the odd crossover of the Predator theme onto Yi originally, because of how it was a big departure from his other skins. As a fan of the Predator series, I didn't much like how Yi had so little in common with one of those aliens, but i was cool.
Rengar and Nidalee were great because they retained more of the traits of a Predator, Rengar more like the big Alpha Predators from the most recent movie, and Nidalee more like the female human character from older Predator comics. Each have weapons and skills more in line with a Predator, so it was a really good fit. 
Caitlyn...I'm kinda on the fence with her. The overall look is less like a Predator and more like a random SciFi safari hunter. I do enjoy the look and feel of the ult, with how it invokes the terror of the shoulder blasters, so it kinda was a mediocre fit.
Adding Akali as a Headhunter ends the line with a whimper after the so-so Caitlyn. 
Predators from all indication in film, have been mainly males. There had been some parts of the franchise that included human women, but not to the extent of the team makeup of the Headhunters now. Akali's weapons and skills do not really reflect a hunter and don't mesh well with the Predator base. Finally, Akali already has a number of skins and sadly there are some champs who have not been getting skin options.

It was a fun line, but it could've been better.
i semi get what you're saying but... stealth and ability to rapidly lunge at you remind me SO much of the AvP game playing as Predator
